sentences.english: Carbohydrates typically provide animals a glucose fix.
sentences.chinese: 碳水化合物爲動物提供葡萄糖凝固劑。

sentences.english: Every single coagulant differed from affecting quality of bean curd.
sentences.chinese: 每種單一凝固劑對豆腐品質的影響不同。

sentences.english: An alkaline coagulant treatment for mixtures of KGM and SPI improved the viscoelastic properties of the gel.
sentences.chinese: 鹼性凝固劑的加入提高了凝膠的粘彈性。
